scripts.chrome-create-zip: cd dist/chrome && find . -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && zip -r ../$npm_package_name-chrome-extension-$npm_package_version.zip * && mv ../$npm_package_name-chrome-extension-$npm_package_version.zip ../dist/
